content.rendered:
> SpeedFace-V5L [TI] It is a fully developed version of SpeedFace-V5L [TD] visual light facial recognition peripheral for body temperature recognition, using facial recognition algorithms for intelligent thermal imaging engineering and the latest computer vision technologies. It supports both face and palm verification with large amplitude and fast recognition, as well as improves security performance in all aspects.

The SpeedFace-V5L [TI] adopts touchless recognition technology and new functions such as temperature detection and convincing individual identification that effectively eliminates hygiene concerns. It is also equipped with the ultimate anti-plagiarism algorithm for facial recognition against almost all types of fake photos and videos. Most importantly, 3-in-1 palm recognition (palm shape, Palm imprint, Palm Vein) is performed in 0.35 seconds for each hand; the palm data obtained will be compared with a maximum of 3000 Palm templates.

The device with temperature detection and masks will be an ideal choice to help limit the spread of germs and help prevent infection directly at every access point of any building or public areas such as hospitals, factories, schools, commercial buildings and stations during the recent World Congress. The problem of Public Health is caused by its rapid and accurate measurement of body temperature and convincing individual recognition functions during face and palm verification.

deteils

Display 5-inch Touch Screen
Face Capacity 20,000
Palm Capacity 3,000
Fingerprint Capacity 20,000 (Standard)
Card Capacity 20,000
Transactions 200,000
Operation System Linux
Standard Functions ID Card, ADMS, T9 Input, DST, Camera, 9-digit User ID,
Access Levels, Groups, Holidays, Anti- passback,
Record Query, Tamper Switch Alarm, Multiple Verify
Modes.
Hardware 900MHz Dual Core CPU, Memory 512MB RAM /8G Flash,2MP WDR Low Light Camera,
Adjustable Light Brightness LED
Communication TCP/IP, WiFi (Optional), Wiegand input /output, RS485
Access Control Interface 3rd Party Electric Lock,Door Sensor, Exit Button, Alarm output, Auxiliary Input
Optional Function 13.56MHz IC Card
Facial Recognition Speed ≤1s
Biometrics Algorithms ZKFace V5.8 & ZKFinger V10.0 & ZKPalm V12.0
Power Supply 12V 3A
Operating Humidity 10% – 90%
Operating Temperature -10°C ~ 45°C (14°F ~ 113°F)
Dimensions (W*H*D) 91.93 * 202.93 * 21.5 (mm)
Supported Softwares ZKBioAccess

• 0.1 s temperature detection speed
• Measuring distance up to 120cm

• Multiple ways to verify: face / palm / fingerprint / password
